project.title: Cintas First Aid & Safety Animation Series
project.problem: Cintas is in need of a series of animations highlighting their various first aid and safety service offerings including AED maintenance and training, as well as first aid safety training.
project.solution: I created illustrations in a consistent, on-brand style for Cintas, following scripts to design storyboards and conceptualize ideas for motion. Working together with an animator, revisions were made as needed and final videos outputted for the Cintas team to use in their promotion materials.

headerImage.altText: a vector illustration of a group of people in an office setting standing, talking, using computers, with a blue skyline background

images.altText: a vector illustration of a man clutching his chest and a woman on a cell phone, text reads "#1 cause of death"
A vector illustration of man fading in transparency next to a woman on the phone. Text reads "anywhere. anytime."
Vector illustration of the back of a man holding tablet inspecting an AED. Text has a checklist of items he is checking on the AED.
Dark blue background with text that reads "We know what it takes to get your AED Program Ready"
Dark background with CIntas logo in blue circle. Techy strings branch off from the logo with circles holding first aid icons
dark blue background with text that reads "250+ Safety Training Topics"
An illustrated frame is divided in three, with first section showing a man giving CPR, the second a doctor administering first aid to a man with a wrapped arm, and the third a defibrillator
An illustrated frame is divided in two, with first section showing a man in a Hazmat suit, the second a man in a forklift with a series of boxes

thumbnail.altText: Looking through a window frame, an illustrated group of people are sitting around a table receiving AED training from a woman holding an AED in front of a tv monitor showing a man receiving CPR. Video controls overlay the image.
